聖.definition: (bound form) peerless (in wisdom, moral virtue, skill etc); (bound form) peerless individual; paragon (sage, saint, emperor, master of a skill etc); (bound form) holy; sacred

聖上.definition: courtier's or minister's form of address for the current Emperor

聖事.definition: Holy sacrament; Christian rite (esp. Catholic); also called 聖禮|圣礼 by Protestants

聖人.definition: sage; the Sage (i.e. Confucius); (old) (respectful way of addressing a monarch) your sagacious majesty; (religion) saint

聖伯多祿大殿.pinyin: shèng bó duō lù dà diàn

聖佛明節.definition: Fiesta de Saint Fermin, festival held annually in Pamplona, Spain

聖保羅.definition: St Paul; São Paulo, city in Brazil

聖像.definition: (old) image of Confucius; holy image (of Buddha or Jesus Christ etc)

聖克魯斯島.definition: Santa Cruz Island, off the California coast

聖善.definition: supreme goodness; (respectful term for sb's mother)

聖地.definition: holy land (of a religion); sacred place; shrine; holy city (such as Jerusalem, Mecca etc); center of historic interest

聖地亞哥.definition: Santiago, capital of Chile; San Diego, California

聖地牙哥.definition: (Tw) San Diego, California; Santiago, capital of Chile

聖基茨和尼維斯.pinyin: shèng jī cí hé ní wéi sī

聖多明各.definition: Santo Domingo, capital of the Dominican Republic

聖多明哥.definition: Santo Domingo, capital of Dominican Republic (Tw)

聖多美.definition: Sao Tome, capital of Sao Tome and Principe

聖多美和普林西比.pinyin: shèng duō měi hé pǔ lín xī bǐ

聖奧古斯丁.definition: St Augustine; Aurelius Augustinus (354-430), theologian and Christian philosopher; Sankt Augustin, suburb of Beuel, Bonn, Germany

聖女貞德.definition: Joan of Arc (1412-1431), French heroine and liberator, executed as a witch by the Burgundians and English

聖子.definition: Holy Son; Jesus Christ; God the Son (in the Christian Trinity)

聖安地列斯斷層.pinyin: shèng ān dì liè sī duàn céng
聖安地列斯斷層.definition: San Andreas Fault, California; also written 聖安德列斯斷層|圣安德列斯断层

聖安多尼堂區.pinyin: shèng ān duō ní táng qū
聖安多尼堂區.definition: St Anthony Parish (Macau); Freguesia de Santo António

聖安德列斯斷層.pinyin: shèng ān dé liè sī duàn céng

聖德克旭貝里.pinyin: shèng dé kè xù bèi lǐ

聖德太子.definition: Prince Shōtoku Taiji (574-621), major Japanese statesman and reformer of the Asuka period 飛鳥時代|飞鸟时代[Fei1 niao3 Shi2 dai4], proponent of state Buddhism, portrayed as Buddhist saint

聖手.definition: divine physician; sage doctor; highly skilled practitioner

聖文森及格瑞那丁.pinyin: shèng wén sēn jí gé ruì nà dīng

聖文森和格林納丁.pinyin: shèng wén sēn hé gé lín nà dīng
聖文森和格林納丁.definition: St Vincent and Grenadines, Caribbean island in Lesser Antilles

聖文森特和格林納丁斯.pinyin: shèng wén sēn tè hé gé lín nà dīng sī

聖明.definition: enlightened sage; brilliant master (flattering words applied to ruler)

聖朝.definition: the current imperial dynasty; one's own court

聖母升天節.definition: Assumption of the Virgin Mary (Christian festival on 15th August)

聖潘克勒斯站.pinyin: shèng pān kè lēi sī zhàn

聖父.definition: Holy Father; God the Father (in the Christian Trinity)

聖皮埃爾和密克隆.pinyin: shèng pí āi ěr hé mì kè lóng

聖神.definition: feudal term of praise for ruler, king or emperor; general term for saint in former times; term for God during the Taiping Heavenly Kingdom 太平天國|太平天国; Holy Spirit (in Christian Trinity)

聖神降臨.definition: Whit Sunday (Christian Festival celebrating the Holy Spirit)

聖禮.definition: Holy sacrament; Christian rite (esp. Protestant); also called 聖事|圣事 by Catholics

聖約翰斯.definition: St John's, capital of Labrador and Newfoundland province, Canada

聖納帕.definition: Agia Napa, Cyprus; Ayia Napa, Cyprus

聖索非亞大教堂.pinyin: shèng suǒ fēi yà dà jiào táng
聖索非亞大教堂.definition: Hagia Sophia (the main cathedral of Constantinople, subsequently the major mosque of Istanbul)

聖經.definition: the Confucian classics; (Christianity, Judaism) the holy scriptures; CL:本[ben3],部[bu4]

聖經外傳.definition: Apocrypha; biography external to the classics

聖經賢傳.definition: lit. holy scripture and biography of sage (idiom); refers to Confucian canonical texts

聖胡安.definition: San Juan, capital of Puerto Rico

聖薩爾瓦多.definition: San Salvador, capital of El Salvador

聖誕.definition: Christmas; birthday of reigning Emperor; Confucius' birthday

聖誕頌.definition: A Christmas Carol by Charles Dickens

聖諭.definition: imperial edict; see also 上諭|上谕[shang4 yu4]

聖賢.definition: a sage; wise and holy man; virtuous ruler; Buddhist lama; wine

聖路易斯.definition: St Louis, large city in eastern Missouri

聖躬.definition: the Emperor's body; Holy body; the current reigning Emperor

聖雄.definition: sage hero; refers to Mahatma Gandhi

聖體.definition: the Emperor's body; Jesus' body; communion wafer (in Christian mass)

聖體節.definition: Corpus Christi (Catholic festival on second Thursday after Whit Sunday)

聖體血.definition: the body and blood of Christ; Holy communion
